item.title: GOMAA-Geo: GOal Modality Agnostic Active Geo-localization
item.description: GOMAA-Geo, a novel framework, enables efficient and accurate goal localization using aerial imagery, regardless of goal description modality (text or images), demonstrating impressive zero-shot genera…
